subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Vince Carter scored 8 of his 23 points in the final four minutes, Jason Kidd added 11 of his 17 in the fourth quarter, and the Nets beat the host Milwaukee Bucks, 97-95, on Saturday night.
snippet: Vince Carter scored 8 of his 23 points in the final four minutes, Jason Kidd added 11 of his 17 in the fourth quarter, and the Nets beat the host Milwaukee Bucks, 97-95, on Saturday night.
